text: Hi Guys, I need to help of page performance. I am getting 12/30 performance in website grader tool. Do you have any idea how to improve page performance?
HubSpot provides some recommendations for improving page speed in Marketing > Website > SEO. You could also scan using Google PageSpeed Insights, which probably will provide the same recommendations

1. For images: Use `width` attribute on all the `<img>` tags, and use an online optimizer before uploading them to HubSpot.
2. Check if you are fetching any unused `js` or `css` (Usually I see everything being fetched on the base layout)
Itâ€™s hard to tell more without more details, but these 2 are the ones that I see happening quite often

Thanks <@U01U201MTQF>
